Projects Contact

My Projects

Euphorus

    Made with:

Uses a QUT made REST API that holds happiness data collected from the World Happiness Report initiative. Users can register, login and view happiness data by country. Users can filter the data by year, country and search limit. AG Grid and Chart.js were used to present the data.

Live Code

Techprowl

    Made with:

Computer Auction CRUD application that allows uers to bid, review, login/register, post new listings, manage listings and keep a watch list.

Live Code

Flight Itinerary Generator

    Made with:

Console app that generates an itinerary by receiving a mail file, plane specification file, trip starting time and output file. Program uses a heuristic algorithm to find minmize the flight length and outputs the end result to the console.

Code

Top 10 Songs

    Made with:

Python program that uses regular expressions to scrape music websites and display current and previous top songs. Users can preview the selected songs in the app, export them to a html file or save them to a database file.

Code
